title: Its been 5 days.. I still haven't recieved anything
body:
Hi
So I went to the NSW Hoyt's viewing party for Legacy vs Chiefs, and was told i would get a mystery skin for participating ( I was the bad nautilis)
I haven't received a mystery skin yet
Will this come soon? 
Would ask for a certain skin (cough Championship Riven cough) But yeah could someone tell me what has happened
Thanks

replies.body: Ahh ok, btw, ive applied for a PBE account many times, how do i get accepted? I have a small youtube channel that i wanna grow, and want to showcase new items skins champs etc. Can you help me with this?

Hey mate,

Those should be added to your account mid this week!

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=rpwVgmEx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-11T05:12:46.747+0000)
>
> Hey mate,
> 
> Those should be added to your account mid this week!

I never knew we got a mystery gift, and i never got one
If you were at the Hoyts event, there were community groups there hosting activities for you to participate. Some winning participants got to win Mystery Skins!
Have recieved it, thanks for this!

Hey there,

From what I can find the only rewards being given out for the viewing parties this time around is a 3-day IP Boost, did you book your ticket online? If so you should've received a redemptpion code via email for your IP boost.

If you haven't received your code please firstly check your junk email just in case it’s made its way in there by accident! If you still can’t find it please [contact HOYTS Customer Service](https://hoyts.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/categories/201755258-Cinema) with your online booking number and email address of which your booking was made with. HOYTS will resend your redemption code to the email address of which you made your booking. For security purposes, HOYTS will only be able to resend the same redemption code you would have received and only to the email address of which the booking was made with in the first place.

For more information check out [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/Te5n67OW-hoyts-and-league-of-legends-viewing-parties-update) thread and the [hoyts viewing party page](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/hoyts-viewing-parties/) for more info.

Hi
What i mean was they had a competition where 6 people had to imitate the 6 banned champions.  I was one of these
the victor got an RP card, and everyone else was to get a mystery skin
I've sent a message to the appropriate person for more information, he should reply soon.
